response.job_title: Data Scientist Technical Lead at Mercado Libre
response.summary: I am a data scientist with a strong focus on machine learning engineering (Google Cloud Machine Learning Engineering Certificate). More than 3 years of experience creating and putting machine learning models into production in the cloud for different business verticals (Oil&Gas, e-learning, marketing). I love the mix between academia and industry to build models with high business impact. I also like working with interdisciplinary teams, I think that is the way to generate innovative solutions in machine learning.
response.skills: Aprendizaje automático, parallel computing, Artificial Intelligence (AI), machine learning, Machine Learning, Computer Vision, Distributed Systems, Programming, Ciencia de datos, Programación orientada a objetos (POO), Deep Learning, Node.js, JavaScript, C++, Python, Docker, C, JSON, SQL, TensorFlow

profile_positions.description:
• Machine Learning model industrialization (recommendation, probabilistic programming, segmentation, analytics, etc.) using Kubeflow and Tensorflow Extended on Google Cloud Platform.

• Design (together with the Data Scientist team) and construction of a confidence interval estimation model (using probabilistic programming) over ​​a Deep Learning base model for sales forecasting in more than 200 gas stations in Colombia. Then the elasticity of the stations was estimated for decision making.

• Development a two-stage segmentation model for an e-learning platform with more than 3M users  using the behavior of the users (using graph2vec https://arxiv.org/abs/1707.05005); and another based on business metrics using quartiles. This to determine value segments according to business metrics and user behavior.

• Development of probabilistic graphic models (2TBN and custom developments) for the company's internal app.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Develop a fast clustering algorithm using flatbush (https://github.com/mourner/flatbush) to determine the best positions for electric stations across Ethiopia.
• Viability study of unreal engine for simulation on Self-driving car environments.
profile_positions.title: Machine Learning Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Develop Machine Learning (https://github.com/mljs/ml) and Computer Vision (https://github.com/image-js) libraries. 

• Extract NMR information from organic chemistry papers to show over a CouchDB database and maintain and deploy Docker services
profile_positions.title: Javascript Developer

profile_positions.description: • Grade partial exams of those courses and help the students with their issues.
profile_positions.title: Auxiliary student of Operating Systems and Databases courses

profile_positions.description:
• Develop a Machine Learning library (https://github.com/mljs/ml) for Node.js and the browser with online examples (http://www.cheminfo.org/) from the Visualizer Project (https://github.com/NPellet/visualizer)

• Develop a web application for spectra dye comparison.
profile_positions.title: Javascript Developer

company.name: Mercado Libre
company.description:
Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Mercado Libre is Latin America’s leading e-commerce technology company.  Through its primary platforms, MercadoLibre.com and MercadoPago.com, it provides solutions to individuals and companies buying, selling, advertising, and paying for goods online.    
Mercado Libe serves millions of users and creates a market for a wide variety of goods and services in an easy, safe and efficient way.  
MercadoLibre maintains a leadership position in 18 Latin American countries.  The Company listed on Nasdaq (NASDAQ: MELI) following its initial public offering in 2007.
